metadata.name: Packing for a hike up the Bamyan mountains
metadata.description: We had to go up the rocky and rough (yet remarkably stunning) mountains for a small shoot. The only gear you can take there is the one you can carry yourself and the one that can be carried by the mules (up to a certain point). The latter would be equipped by the locals - an incredible mixture of sincere hospitality and "marks" of a rather rough life experience.
